entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
